name: Five Nightmare Nights
description:
CHAPTER ONE: after freddy fazbear's pizza closed for murder and disappearance in 1992 in 1994 opened a new restaurant that was named (red restaurant) which featured a red and female gender freddy called rednight with friends foxy - springtrap (william afton) - puppet - shadow freddy but one night rednight was active at dawn and I enter the hallway that leads to parts and services from there found foxy dismantled on the floor she casually approached and turned off completely nothing else I touch the next day is active again at dawn but this time the room was different color and in front sulla found her friend puppet which is approaching and puppet moved losing her from view later found a shadow freddy lying on the floor and she just went off completely deactivated as the previous day so it was every night until in a meeting with william along with shadow freddy and also was puppet with tears red in ghost mode along with foxy rednight approached shadow freddy and this is teleported to a lost place of black this is again back to shadow freddy which it disappeared and rednight ended up becoming a ghost is together with his friends foxy and puppet attack william destroying his suit due to accidents that had the animatronics the restaurant was closed completely replacing it in 1995 with a new restaurant that was named (fazbear restaurant)

CHAPTER TWO: the restaurant was very successful and hard until half of 1997 with 4 animatronics which were freddy - foxy - springtrap (michael afton) - puppet but one night a person entered the restaurant with the shadow freddy costume that belonged to the restaurant of 1994 this had the idea of destroying the animatronics the first one to destroy was puppet which this one easily destroyed by decapitating it then it was foxy which destroyed it by taking out one part of the arm and one part of the leg and then it was because of freddy but not he was very lucky because freddy was casually activated and when he saw the person in disguise he started attacking him, hitting him and eating body parts fortunately the restaurant employees arrived and quickly deactivated freddy before the disguised person died instantly lamentably michael after that suffered terrifying and schizophrenic changes becoming an animatronic really decided to improve freddy and foxy with glittering details but due to the broken states they could not repair them at all and asked for help for someone to work for 5 nights which after several weeks arrived a person named tommy varivant who accepted the job

press F5 to save the game and F6 to load the game
